subsystems_found.name: Math Utilities
subsystems_found.summary: Contains math utility functions like add, multiply, divide and fibonacci.

subsystems_found.name: Greeting Module
subsystems_found.summary: Provides a basic greeting function that prints 'Hello, world!'

improvement_opportunities.description: Expanding the safe command list and validating it against more sophisticated attack vectors.
'fibonacci()' function uses recursion which is highly inefficient. This could be improved using memoization or iterative approach to reduce time complexity and space utilization.
